productDetails.name: Blue DE Chanel 30ML
productDetails.shortDescription: A sophisticated woody aromatic fragrance for men.
productDetails.fullDescription: Blue DE Chanel is a timeless and sophisticated fragrance that embodies independence and determination. This woody aromatic scent opens with fresh citrus notes, followed by a heart of vetiver and pink pepper, and finishes with a warm base of cedar and incense. Perfect for the modern man who seeks refinement and elegance in every detail.
productDetails.ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Coumarin, Citral, Geraniol
productDetails.howToUse: Spray on pulse points such as neck, wrists, and behind the ears. Apply after showering for longer lasting effect. Do not rub the fragrance into the skin.
features: Perfect for day and evening wear

reviewsData.author: Michael Chen
reviewsData.comment: Amazing fragrance! Smells sophisticated and lasts all day. Worth every penny.

reviewsData.author: David Brown
reviewsData.comment: Classic Chanel quality. The 30ml size is perfect for travel.

productDetails.name: Vempire Blood 30ML
productDetails.shortDescription: An intriguing and mysterious fragrance with dark notes.
productDetails.fullDescription: Vempire Blood is a captivating and mysterious fragrance that combines dark, seductive notes to create an unforgettable scent experience. With rich notes of dark berries, exotic spices, and deep woods, this fragrance is perfect for those who want to make a bold statement. The unique blend creates an aura of mystery and sophistication that lingers throughout the day.
productDetails.ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Linalool, Coumarin, Eugenol, Citral
productDetails.howToUse: Apply to pulse points including wrists, neck, and chest. For best results, apply to moisturized skin. Can be layered with unscented body lotion for enhanced longevity.

reviewsData.author: Sarah Williams
reviewsData.comment: Absolutely love this scent! It's unique and gets so many compliments.

reviewsData.author: James Anderson
reviewsData.comment: Very mysterious and seductive scent. Lasts all day!

reviewsData.author: Emma Davis
reviewsData.comment: Great fragrance but quite strong. Use sparingly!

productDetails.name: Crocs Classic Clogs
productDetails.fullDescription: Crocs Classic Clogs are the original and most recognizable style from Crocs. Loved for their comfort, versatility, and fun style, these clogs feature lightweight Croslite™ material construction that cushions your feet and offers amazing comfort all day long. The ventilation ports add breathability and help shed water and debris. Perfect for indoor and outdoor use, these clogs are easy to clean and quick to dry, making them ideal for any casual activity.
productDetails.howToUse: Slip on and adjust the heel strap for a secure fit. Clean with mild soap and water. Air dry only. Do not expose to extreme heat.

specifications.Care Instructions: Wash with mild soap and water, air dry

features: Easy to clean and quick to dry
Pivoting heel straps for secure fit
Perfect for indoor and outdoor use

reviewsData.author: Jennifer Taylor
reviewsData.comment: Most comfortable shoes ever! Perfect for work and casual wear.

reviewsData.author: Mark Johnson
reviewsData.comment: Love these Crocs! So easy to slip on and super comfortable.

reviewsData.author: Lisa Martinez
reviewsData.comment: Great shoes but run a bit large. Order half size down.

productDetails.name: Good girl - Inspired Version 30ML
productDetails.shortDescription: Amber Floral, sweet Gourmand, Warm & Sensual fragrance.
productDetails.fullDescription: Good girl - Inspired Version is a captivating fragrance that combines amber floral notes with sweet gourmand accords, creating a warm and sensual scent experience. This Eau de Parfum opens with delicate floral notes that transition into a rich, sweet gourmand heart, finishing with warm amber and sensual base notes. Perfect for those who love sophisticated, feminine fragrances with depth and character.
productDetails.ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Coumarin, Citral, Geraniol
productDetails.howToUse: Spray on pulse points such as neck, wrists, and behind the ears. Apply after showering for longer lasting effect. Do not rub the fragrance into the skin.

productDetails.name: Dior sauvage - Inspired Version 30ML
productDetails.fullDescription: Dior Sauvage - Inspired Version is a bold and fresh fragrance that captures the essence of modern masculinity. This Eau de Toilette opens with fresh, invigorating notes that quickly transition into a spicy heart, revealing a masculine character. The woody base notes provide depth and longevity, creating a sophisticated scent that is both fresh and powerful. Perfect for the confident man who appreciates quality fragrances.
productDetails.ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Coumarin, Citral, Geraniol
productDetails.howToUse: Spray on pulse points such as neck, wrists, and behind the ears. Apply after showering for longer lasting effect. Do not rub the fragrance into the skin.

productDetails.name: Dior sauvage - Inspired Version 50ML
productDetails.fullDescription: Dior Sauvage - Inspired Version in 50ML is a bold and fresh fragrance that captures the essence of modern masculinity. This Eau de Toilette opens with fresh, invigorating notes that quickly transition into a spicy heart, revealing a masculine character. The woody base notes provide depth and longevity, creating a sophisticated scent that is both fresh and powerful. The larger 50ML size offers better value and longer-lasting supply for the confident man who appreciates quality fragrances.
productDetails.ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Linalool, Citronellol, Coumarin, Citral, Geraniol
